Milt and Cary,
Check page 246, the entry for Hitachi province, where Mito is located.  There seem to have been a number of Shoami makers from Aizu and Kyoto moving to Mito in the early Edo period.  I don't see any individual names mentioned.  Bob Haynes called this morning to point it out.  I haven't tried to dig into it yet, maybe someone who reads Japanese better than I do can check it out.

Jim  



  Cary, Jim und all,
  How about the book Tsuba Taikan  ?
  That book is supposed to be  inclusive of " all " known schools...........I 
  cannot find " Mito Shoami " in any section.

  Milt
